  32. from __future__ import with_statement
  33. from django.db import models
  34. from django.utils.text import ugettext_lazy as _
  36. class EntryBase(models.Model):
  37. """A base abstract model of Entry"""
  38. title = models.CharField(_('title'), max_length=50, unique=True)
  39. body = models.TextField(_('body'))
  41. created_at = models.DateTimeField(_('date and time created'),
  42. auto_now_add=True)
  43. updated_at = models.DateTimeField(_('date and time updated'),
  44. auto_now=True)
  46. class Meta:
  47. abstract = True
  49. def __unicode__(self):
  50. return self.title
  52. @models.permalink
  53. def get_absolute_url(self):
  54. return ('blogs-entry-detail', (), {'slug': self.title})
  56. def clean(self):
  57. """custom validation"""
  58. from django.core.exceptions import ValidationError
  59. if self.title in ('create', 'update', 'delete'):
  60. raise ValidationError(
  61. """The title cannot be 'create', 'update' or 'delete'""")
  63. class Entry(EntryBase):
  64. """mini blog entry model
  66. >>> entry = Entry()
  68. # Attribute test
  69. >>> assert hasattr(entry, 'title')
  70. >>> assert hasattr(entry, 'body')
  71. >>> assert hasattr(entry, 'created_at')
  72. >>> assert hasattr(entry, 'updated_at')
  74. # Function test
  75. >>> assert callable(getattr(entry, '__unicode__'))
  76. >>> assert callable(getattr(entry, 'get_absolute_url'))
  77. """
  78. pass
